de.ur.iw.navigame.utility

Class FileStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ur.iw.navigame.utility.FileStorage

  • public class FileStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that facilitates storing and loading files.

      Checks if a file exists for a given file name.

      Returns the path where the WAR is located.

      Loads a file and hands its contents to the consumer, if everything went OK

      Loads a file and returns its contents directly (without using a callback)
      static void setServletContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
      In order to get the local file path of the application (where the "war" is located) this class needs a reference to the ServletContext.

      Stores a (text) file on this server.

    • Method Detail

      • setServletContext

        public static void setServletContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        In order to get the local file path of the application (where the "war" is located) this class needs a reference to the ServletContext.
        Parameters:
        context - servlet context for this application.

      • storeFile

        public static void storeFile(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String contents)
        Stores a (text) file on this server.
        Parameters:
        name - how the file should be called
        contents - the text for the file

      • storeImageFile

        public static void storeImageFile(java.lang.String name,
                                  byte[] contents)
        Stores an image file on this server. Different from storeFile(String, String) because Strings cause problems with images.
        Parameters:
        name - how the file should be called.
        contents - bytes of the image file

      • fileExists

        public static boolean fileExists(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a file exists for a given file name.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the file
        Returns:
        true, if it exists; false, otherwise

      • loadFile

        public static void loadFile(java.lang.String name,
                            java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.String> onSuccess,
                            java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Void> onFail)
        Loads a file and hands its contents to the consumer, if everything went OK
        Parameters:
        name - name of the file
        onSuccess - success callback, will receive the contents of the file
        onFail - error callback

      • loadFileNoCallback

        public static java.lang.String loadFileNoCallback(java.lang.String name)
        Loads a file and returns its contents directly (without using a callback)
        Parameters:
        name - file name
        Returns:
        the contents of the file, as a String

      • getPath

        private static java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns the path where the WAR is located.
        Returns:
        the server's path on the server machine.
